meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a noun.
meanings.sent1: The book had many nouny words in it.
meanings.sent2: She pointed to the nouny words in the sentence.
meanings.sent3: The nouny book decided to write its own story.
meanings.sent4: Her dress was a nouny masterpiece of colors and patterns.
meanings.sent5: The nouny clouds floated lazily in the sky.

meanings.definition: Having the qualities or characteristics of a noun.
meanings.sent1: The nouny apple fell from the tree.
meanings.sent2: He described the nouny qualities of the object.
meanings.sent3: The nouny cat loved to play with words.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as warm and comforting as a nouny hug.
meanings.sent5: The nouny flower bloomed beautifully in the garden.
